body.p: Born May 9, 1835 in Shelby County. Farmer and merchant. Educated at Eminence College. Began career as farmer and moved into hotel keeping, the stockyard business, and wool dealing. Enlisted in Union Army in Ninth Kentucky Cavalry. Wounded at the battle of Perryville. Married to Anna E. Shawhan children included Henry Shawhan and Maggie Lyne.
